articles.author: Emily Chan, Koney Bai
articles.title: 简报：报告称中国黑客试图窃取俄罗斯国防数据；拜登出访亚洲，向盟友重申对中国关注
articles.description: 俄高官现身乌克兰城市宣誓控制权；乌克兰战争导致非洲出现饥荒；美国新冠逝者突破100万；俄克拉荷马州立法者通过美国最严堕胎法案……这里是今日要闻。

articles.author: Anemona Hartocollis
articles.title: Princeton President Recommends Firing Joshua Katz After Uproar
articles.description: Joshua Katz says he was targeted because of his criticism of a campus protest group. A university report says the concerns are related to his inappropriate conduct with a female student.

articles.title: Spring Auction Sales for Two Blockbuster Weeks Top $2.5 Billion
articles.description: Eleven auction records for artists — six by women — were smashed on Thursday night in two sales at Sotheby’s.

articles.description: The singer made the comments less than three months after Russia enacted a law that would punish spreading “false information” about its invasion.
